reviews.text: Hotel Stücki is located about 500 m away from the Badener Bahnhof (train station), easy to reach by car. However, look for the shopping mall Stücki, I could not se a sign pointing to the Best Western hotel. Cars are parke in the parking lot of the shopping mall, there are spaces reserved for hotel guests.
reviews.title: A nice one

reviews.text: The rooms are rather large, well equipeed and pretty quite. There is a slow, cost-free internet connection available in the room, which is really sloooooow, almost on modem level. Additionally, there is a faster connection available, however, this one needs to be paid for.
reviews.title: Just Amazing!

reviews.text: Breakfast was easy, but of good quality, the staff courteous and efficient. After all, this is Switzerland:-)
reviews.title: Brilliant Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed three nights in this 3 star hotel and I really enjoyed it. The hotel has everything I thought I would ever need, so I couldn’t understand why the hotel is not 4star. It is located in Kleinhünigen, which is reachable by tram 8 easily; it is 18 minutes from the Swiss Railway station. There is a shopping centre just next to the hotel which is open until about 21.00 in the evening. It has many shops, places to eat and a Migros in it, so it is very useful.
reviews.title: great stay. quite impressed

reviews.text: The rooms are big, really comfortable, modernly designed and stylish. There is a minibar, a kettle , tea&coffee that are refreshed every day and two bottles of water. The wired/wireless is free in the room, you can log in with you room number and surname. It is a bit slow though, if you want faster internet, it is just 8CHF/day, so very useful.
reviews.title: Fantastic facilities, but location is not for everyone

reviews.text: My family and I were booked in for 1 night and actually ended up extending for 3 nights we were so happy with our accommodation.
reviews.title: A great surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in an apartment on the top floor which was split into bedroom and large folding sofa bed in a living room with fridge, cooker and coffee maker -complimentary coffee and tea included.
reviews.title: Good pre-cruise hotel

reviews.text: Room was immaculate and bathroom spotless. Large corner bath and walk in shower behind a glass dividing wall which was very stylish. Two flat screen tv's in bedroom and living room.
reviews.title: Nice place, a bit out of the way though.

reviews.text: Service very friendly, excellent reception staff with good English. Attached to a fantastic shopping centre with supermarket and children's crèche. Underground parking.
reviews.title: Beautiful Modern Hotel

reviews.text: Location isn't in the centre of the city but you get free public transport in all Basel hotels during your stay. Basel itself takes only 15 to get. Across on main roads so it's not the equivalent of being on the outskirts of London for example. Easy access to Basel Mulhouse Airport.
reviews.title: Good overnight stop on a long journey

reviews.text: We booked a triple room - rooms are modern and big ! There is a wall divide between the 2 beds and the other - very good ! The beds were very comfy too ! 2 around tables, chairs and good empty fridge( no mini bar) good to put few drinks, etc, and kettle with tea/coffee
reviews.title: Very good hotel !
Nice Hotel
reviews.text: The bathroom is nice and clean, with good rain shower ! The glass wall of bathroom is quite funky - if you need to go at night and are next to it, just turn on the bedside light, you don't need another !

Next door, you have the shopping mall, with supermarket Migros, handy to get few provisions. Also the restaurant The Block House next door is very good for the steaks - not cheap, but we found the country very expensive all around !
reviews.title: Good Value for Money

reviews.text: We took a day trip to Friburg ( Germany) about 1h train trip to see the xmas market, and we really enjoyed it ! Mulled wine much cheaper there by the way :) 2.50 euros, instead of 5 francs ! Cheap fares, up to 5 persons, from central station !
reviews.title: Decent base for Basel.
A "3 stars" hotel which is equivalent to "4 or 5 stars"
reviews.text: As others said, very easy to get to the hotel and free - Take bus 50 from the airport to central station, then get tram number 8 to Kleinhungen. Get out at the end of line, turn right and walk few minutes, you will see a building Stuecki - cross the bridge and you there !
a newer hotel with large rooms, nice parking facilities, near freeway, conference and shopping center.
reviews.title: business hotel near the center

reviews.text: The staff here was amazing and spoke almost every language there is! The rooms are laid out quite well, bring some PJs the rooms are kind of cold. It is attached to a 2 story shopping mall that has alot of shopping, mostly for females. The food court in the mall is small but has a small pizza shop, subway, mc donalds and a couple others. Between the hotel and mall is a yummy place called The Block House.. Try the steak. I was here on business so my "freetime" was limited and to be honest i dont think id return to this area on vacation not due to the hotel but the lack of entertainment ,everything costs a fortune and the country shuts down on sunday ..cant even shop.. but back to the hotel. There is a bar in house, fitness center, parking garage, pool table, fooseball table, poker table available for free in the lobby, free pass for public transportation in the city and free internet. I spent my birthday here and received a Happy Birthday card signed by everyone on staff and a plate of fruit.. and i didnt even tell them it was my birthday! Overall great stay! Quality of this hotel reminds me of my stays with Hilton.
reviews.title: Great Staff, Great Stay

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel as stop over during our trip to Italy. Normally we stayed in Germany close to the border in a nice hotel where parking is for free and the breakfast is included in the rate. But this time that hotel was completely booked, so we had to look for another option. That is how we ended at Stuecki. And I have to say, we didn’t regret it!
reviews.title: 3* with the infrastructure of a 4*!

reviews.text: This is an excellent 3 stars hotel. Better than many 4 stars hotel I stayed in! Probably the only thing that makes 3 stars is that you don’t have room service, however the restaurant next door will do anything to accommodate your wishes.
reviews.title: A great experience
